name: 4000 El Diablo
additionalNotes: The Pinar 4000 was blended to create the smoothness of the P3000 while keeping the medium full body at the same time. Each leave that went in to the blend of the P3000 was examined and a new leaf was chosen to take its place in the new P4000. The end result is a terrific cigar that will remind you of the P3000 while having character of its own.
